description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Research and design the architecture and implement the data processing pipeline for data analytics system
              
              - Collect & analyse structured/unstructured data & business data to understand customers behavior
              
              - Building real-time analytics dashboard for monitoring our infrastructures and services
              
              - Build high performance BI platform for analysing our customer behaviour, improve user experiences
              
              - Tuning and performance optimizing large scale systems
              
              - Scaling our infrastructure, solution to handle high volume of data
              
              - Evaluate and identify new technologies for implementation
              
              - Daily working with data scientist in the design of machine learning models
              
              - Implementing & experiments machine learning, deep learning model to predict customer behavior
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Bachelor or Master degree in Computer Science or related technical discipline
              
              - Fresh graduates with high graduation scores are always welcome to apply
              
              - Understanding about OOP, OOAD, functional programming, design pattern
              
              - Good at algorithms and data structures
              
              - Good knowledge of DBMS & SQL Queries
              
              - Good background in statistics
              
              - Having knowledge & experience of Hadoop Ecosystem (Spark, Hadoop, HBase, ES,..) is big plusses
              
              - Basic knowledge of Linux and operating system
              
              - Experience but not limited to: Scala, Java or Python,..
              
              - Able to work independently as well as in collaborative mode with minimum supervision
              
              - Open minded and excited to explore new concepts and create innovative solutions to improve your product
              

              SALARY & BENEFIT
              
              - We are always opening salary for all tallents with 15-17 months' wage/year
              
              - You’ll love working in our dynamic environment with >14.000 young & active employees
              
              - Honor & Award for the best employees who have great contribution to the company’s success, especially the awards night for 50 best employees each year will be held overseas
              
              - Unique culture with many exciting activities: rookie training, 72 hours experience, team building, status quo, village festival ...
              
              - Attractive sports activities: football, badminton, swimming, table tennis, billiards ...
              
              - Being trained by professionals, having many promoting opportunities to become managers in the leading technology groups in Vietnam, with more than 30,000 people and a professional environment.
              
              - Obtaining full legal insurance coverage for yourself and your family with FPT-Care
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Thu nhập hấp dẫn: 10-15M/tháng. Thưởng tháng lương 13, lương kinh doanh, lương nghỉ mát, lì xì...
               







                Bảo hiểm Y tế, Bảo hiểm xã hội, Bảo hiểm thất nghiệp, Bảo hiểm cho người FPT
               







                Cơ hội được đứng lớp đào tạo liên tục với gần 300 khóa học/năm.
